title: Muteki Shin
name: Tomoe
hero_description:
Top-tier hero viable from 5★, scaling steadily. 

 Peaks: Support (8★), DPS (11★). No awakening dependency.

abilities.name: Draconic Maw
abilities.description: Deals massive physical damage to highest ATK enemy

levels.name: Level 1
levels.description: Deals 298% of her ATK as PDMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Additionally, there's 60% chance to reduce 10 rage from the target up to 5 times. ith each reduction checked separately.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.description: DMG increased to 357%. and there's a 60% chance to reduce fury from the target up to 6 times.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.description: DMG increased to 417%. and there's a 60% chance to reduce fury from the target up to 7 times.

levels.name: Awakened
levels.description: DMG increased to 447%. and there's a 60% chance to reduce fury from the target up to 8 times.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.description: Normal attacks prioritize the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing 75% of her ATK as PDMG and adding 3% of her ATK as True DMG. After attacking, there is a 55% chance to trigger a combo, attacking the same target again. A maximum of 2 combos can be triggered per turn.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.description: Combo trigger chance increases to 65%, combo DMG increases to 80%, and adds 4% of her ATK as True DMG.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.description: Combo trigger chance increases to 75%, combo DMG increases to 85%, and adds 5% of her ATK as True DMG. A maximum of 3 combos can be triggered per turn.

levels.name: Awakened
levels.description: Combo trigger chance increases to 90%, combo DMG increases to 100%, and adds 5% of her ATK as True DMG.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.description: ATK +20%. Max HP +15%. CRIT +5%. In battle, grants a 10% DMG Boost to all allies.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.description: ATK +35%. Max HP +20%. CRIT +10%. In battle, grants a 15% DMG Boost to all allies.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.description: ATK +45%. Max HP +25%. CRIT +15%. In battle, grants a 20% DMG Boost to all allies.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.description: After performing a direct attack, gain 1 [Fury Surge] stack. At the start of each turn, unleash [Draw Slash], dealing 150% + 10% * the number of [Fury Surge] stacks as PDMG to all enemies, with a 50% chance to reduce the target's DEF by 25%. It can only be used once per turn.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.description: [Draw Slash]'s DMG increases to 160% + 20% * the number of [Fury Surge] stacks, with a 60% chance to reduce the target's DEF by 25%.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.description: [Draw Slash]'s DMG increases to 170% + 30% * the number of [Fury Surge] stacks, with a 70% chance to reduce the target's DEF by 25%.

levels.name: Awakened
levels.description: [Draw Slash]'s DMG increases to 180% + 40% * the number of [Fury Surge] stacks, with an 80% chance to reduce the target's DEF by 25%.

levels.name: Fury Surge
levels.description: SPD +5% and DMG +5% for 2 turns. stacking up to 5 times.
